channel.title: CVE Feed for Pods Framework Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pods Framework Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24338|2024-08-03T19:28:23.481Z -- pods%20framework%20team -- pods%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20content%20types%20and%20fields
item.description: The Pods – Custom Content Types and Fields WordPress plugin before 2.7.27 was vulnerable to an Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) security vulnerability within the 'Singular Label' field parameter.

item.title: CVE-2021-24339|2024-08-03T19:28:23.582Z -- pods%20framework%20team -- pods%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20content%20types%20and%20fields
item.description: The Pods – Custom Content Types and Fields WordPress plugin before 2.7.27 was vulnerable to an Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) security vulnerability within the 'Menu Label' field parameter.
